comments:
The text editor on a small text file seems to have problems. I typed a line at
the end of the file, the text comes out mixed up. Then I do a delete and I get:
java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException

Log info:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-06-10 17:33:02.316
!MESSAGE "Delete" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more
information.
